pullrequest.title: Subdivide large heightmaps to fix LOD and support global texture mapping

content.raw:
I think we need to install the new scripts. Trying to open `heightmap_material.world` gives me:

`[Err] [RenderEngine.cc:483] URI doesn't exist[file://media/materials/scripts/heightmap_custom.material]`
content.html:
